author: FOX Sports
title: Follow live: The 2018 NFC Divisional Round classic between the Minnesota Vikings and New Orleans Saints
description: The 2018 NFC Divisional Round matchup between the New Orleans Saints and Minnesota Vikings included a finish for the ages.
content:
On January 14, 2018, the Minnesota Vikings hosted the New Orleans Saints in the NFC Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs.
The game that brought us a Minneapolis Miracle.
The 2017 Divisional Round matchup between the @Vikings and Saints re-airs TONIGHT at 8p… [+982 chars]
